title: Rugby-Ireland team to face France in the Six Nations
text:
February 1, 2018 / 1:28 PM / Updated 9 hours ago Rugby-Ireland team to face France in the Six Nations Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
DUBLIN, Feb 1 (Reuters) - Ireland coach Joe Schmidt on Thursday named the following team to face France in the Six Nations at the Stade de France on Saturday. 
15-Rob Kearney, 14-Keith Earls, 13-Robbie Henshaw, 12-Bundee Aki, 11-Jacob Stockdale, 10-Johnny Sexton, 9-Conor Murray; 8-CJ Stander, 7-Josh van der Flier, 6-Peter Oâ€˜Mahony, 5-James Ryan, 4-Iain Henderson, 3-Tadhg Furlong, 2-Rory Best (captain), 1-Cian Healy. 
Replacements: 16-Sean Cronin, 17-Jack McGrath, 18-John Ryan, 19-Devin Toner, 20-Dan Leavy, 21-Luke McGrath, 22-Joey Carbery, 23-Fergus McFadden. (Reporting by Padraic Halpin; Editing by Toby Davis)
